folder.name: setup for  dedicated sql pool for test  bank data

content.query:
--Verify Your Data Loaded Successfully


-- 1. Check row counts
SELECT 'dim_customers' AS table_name, COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM BankCredit.dim_customers
UNION ALL
SELECT 'fact_loans', COUNT(*) FROM BankCredit.fact_loans
UNION ALL
SELECT 'dim_credit_history', COUNT(*) FROM BankCredit.dim_credit_history;

-- Expected: All should show 100 rows

-- 2. Check for any NULL customer_ids (data quality)
SELECT 'dim_customers' AS table_name, 
       COUNT(*) AS total_rows,
       SUM(CASE WHEN customer_id IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS null_ids
FROM BankCredit.dim_customers
UNION ALL
SELECT 'fact_loans', 
       COUNT(*),
       SUM(CASE WHEN customer_id IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM BankCredit.fact_loans
UNION ALL
SELECT 'dim_credit_history', 
       COUNT(*),
       SUM(CASE WHEN customer_id IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM BankCredit.dim_credit_history;

-- Expected: null_ids should be 0 for all

-- 3. Sample data from each table
SELECT TOP 5 * FROM BankCredit.dim_customers ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT TOP 5 * FROM BankCredit.fact_loans ORDER BY loan_id;
SELECT TOP 5 * FROM BankCredit.dim_credit_history ORDER BY customer_id;

-- 4. Test the 360-degree view
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM BankCredit.v_customer_360;

-- 5. Check for defaulted loans
SELECT 
    customer_id,
    loan_id,
    loan_amount,
    loan_status,
    credit_score,
    credit_utilization,
    risk_category,
    debt_to_income_ratio
FROM BankCredit.vw_customer_risk_profile
WHERE loan_status = 'Defaulted';
